text:
“Keeping Up With the Kardashians” star Kim Kardashian and husband Kanye West celebrated their three-year wedding anniversary Wednesday, and Kim marked the occasion with a special release of behind-the-scenes photos on her app.

“Happy three-year anniversary babe!” she wrote. “Thank you for being the best husband and father. I love you so much.”

In addition to the note, Kardashian posted a number of intimate pictures of her wedding in Florence, Italy. They included sweet photos of North at just 11 months old, Kardashian’s one-of-kind wedding gown by Givenchy Creative Director Riccardo Tisci as well as a few tender moments between Kardashian and West at the couple’s pre-wedding dinner at the Palace of Versailles in France.

Read: Kim Kardashian, Kanye West Doing 'Much Better' Following Reports Of Marital Problems

While the pair both travel extensively for work, an unnamed source told E! News that the two would be spending their anniversary together.

“Kanye and Kim are on a good path,” the source told E! News Wednesday. “They have been really working on their marriage and their overall daily lifestyle with incorporating each other in it during crazy and busy times. Their kids have been the stick that has kept them together in hard times. Kanye and Kim both been through a lot but they have both got help and counseling on their own and with each other.”

Ahead of their special day, the couple scooped up their two children — 3-year-old North and 1-year-old Saint — for a trip to the happiest place on earth: Disneyland. The Kardashian-Wests were all smiles in Anaheim Monday and were joined by Kardashians’s sister Kourtney and her children.

Kim and North at Disneyland yesterday (May 22) pic.twitter.com/DNWWzt7Aw5 — The Wests (@kuwthewests) May 23, 2017

TMZ reported Wednesday that the two families attended the Disneyland bash for a family friend’s birthday. While Kardashian has been making increasingly frequent public appearances in recent months, the outing was a comparatively rare sighting of West. The rapper was previously staying in Jackson Hole, Wyoming on retreat but returned to the family’s California home earlier this week. He’s reportedly working on a new album, and the retreat offered a reprieve from bustling city life to better focus on his project.

Read: Kim Kardashian’s Paris Robbers Tried To Burglarize Her Before, Star Learned During 8-Hour Testimony

It’s been a rough year for Kardashian and West. Kardashian went on hiatus from her demanding schedule after she was robbed at gunpoint in her Paris Apartment in October. Shortly after, West suffered a mental breakdown in November and had to be temporarily hospitalized for exhaustion. The couple is reportedly doing “much better” in recent months, according to sources.

“They went through a really rough time there for awhile,” an unnamed source close to West told People in May. “It was really touch and go. She was dealing with the robbery and all that came after, and she felt like he wasn’t there for her. He was going through his issues around the holidays, and he felt like she wasn’t prioritizing him.”
title: Kim Kardashian And Kanye West Celebrate 3-Year Wedding Anniversary Together
